name: Loaders
summary: Simple Î¼Framework for loading Storyboard and Xib files for iOS.
description: Loaders is a simple way to define all your storyboard's UIViewControllers and NIB reusables (UITableViewCell, UICollectionViewCell, UICollectionReusableView) in clean, declarative way. It brings autocomplete and compile time checking for storyboards and xib files.
